name: Adriatic Pizza
description:
** About **

Adriatic Pizza is a peaceful pizzayolo 3D simulator. In a world inspired by Porco Rosso,
explore islands, deliver pizzas, meet wonderful characters and watch out for your Seaplane fuel !

** Features **

● Explore beautiful islands and deliver pizzas with your Seaplane
● Cooking pizzas and take care of your garden
● Cut woods for your oven
● Meet wonderful characters
● Build your new restaurant
● Discover a nice story inspired by Porco Rosso
